sentences.en: A prom, short for promenade is a formal dance.
sentences.cn: 舞会, 是promenade的简称,是正式的舞蹈.

sentences.en: A promenade was proposed water front to provide leisure facilities.
sentences.cn: 于荃湾海边加建海滨广场,提供休憩设施.

sentences.en: A wide promenade allows many people to walk at the same time.
sentences.cn: 宽阔的人行道可容许多人同时行走.

sentences.en: About 4 km long waterfront promenade connecting Central to North Point.
sentences.cn: 连接中环至北角长约4公里的拟议海滨长廊.

sentences.en: He used to promenade his child along the seaside after supper.
sentences.cn: 过去他常在晚饭后带着孩子在海滨散步.

sentences.en: I want a relationship I can promenade in the park.
sentences.cn: 我想要一段关系大家可以在公园散散步.

sentences.en: I was battling my way along the promenade in the teeth of a force ten gale.
sentences.cn: 我不顾十级大风沿着步行街挣扎前行。

sentences.en: Nous avons fait une promenade dans la montagne.
People came out in smarter clothes to promenade along the front.
sentences.cn: 人们穿上更加时髦漂亮的衣服，沿着海滨散步。

sentences.en: Promenade fence, painting sculpture, modeled on the Imperial Palace.
sentences.cn: 长廊围栏, 油画雕刻, 仿照皇宫.

sentences.en: She promenade the children along the sea front after lunch.
sentences.cn: 她午饭后领著孩子们沿著海滨区散步.

sentences.en: Then the Esplanade, which is a seafront promenade bordering an open filed where festivals and events are often held.
sentences.cn: 这是海滨小广场，在这个海边散步长廊围出来的开阔地经常有节日和比赛项目举行。

sentences.en: There were two or three palm trees flourishing in the promenade garden.
sentences.cn: 街心花园里有两三棵枝繁叶茂的棕榈树.

sentences.en: They returned at twilight, and set off for one of the promenade bars.
sentences.cn: 他们黄昏时分回来，然后去了一家步行街酒吧。

sentences.en: Visitors might also travel to the nearby promenade by bicycles.
sentences.cn: 参观人士可以单车代步,前往大埔海滨游览.

sentences.en: We took a promenade along the canal after Sunday dinner.
sentences.cn: 星期天晚饭后我们沿着运河散步.

trans.tran_cn: 散步，闲逛，通道，走廊，舞会，骑马
trans.tran_en: a wide road next to the beach, where people can walk for pleasure
